decision_conditions: The foundation details submitted fail to protect tree roots as stipulated in Condition 11. The plan illustrating a cross-section of the foundations appears to show the beams below ground level. This defies the purpose of installing pile foundations around tree roots and consequently the condition cannot be discharged, all contrary to policies 3.8, 4.1, 4.5, 5.5 and 5.9 of the Adopted 'Unitary Development Plan, 'Plan for the Environment' (2004), Supplementary Planning Guidance 9, and policies 7.4, 7.5 & 7.21 of The London Plan (2011).
description: Details of Foundations, Ground Levels And Underground Services pursuant to condition 11 of planning permission PP/2011/3196 dated 10/10/2011 for Part single, part two storey side extension and part single, part two storey rear extension and installation of roof lights to front, rear and side roofslopes (To View Plans See Ref: PP/2012/0060)
